      • batHint

        private void batHint(android.support.v4.util.ArraySet<CaveContent> arraySet,
                     CaveContent caveContent)
        If there is a Bat in an adjacent cave, plays an audio and show a message as a hint.
        Parameters:
        arraySet - Entities that are in the adjacent caves.
        caveContent - A random entity, if this is equal to the entity case, the method will play an audio.
